room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: This was my first time doing this and i loved it. so much fun. I would definitely suggest anyone coming to vegas to do this in caesars palace.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: My first escape room experience and it was super fun and staff is very friendly and great customer service! 10/10 recommend at the Forum Shops in Caesars Palace.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: The escape game was simply amazing! Had the entire family working together in a fun exciting way. We escaped "the heist" with just seconds left on the clock! I highly recommended the escape game at ceasers forum.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: A very well done job with the intention of working as a team. Very good for team building outing. Recommend it for fun.
